snippet.title: Serious Sam: The First Encounter Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the original trailer for Serious Sam: The First Encounter.  The first gameplay trailer for "Serious Sam HD" (can be seen here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4sKpn6d9Bek ) was heavily inspired by this trailer, including the same music and a couple other similarities.

Can't wait for SS: HD :)
